ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Comments about assessment
When I meet new people, I like wondering how they got to where they are in life.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Disagree; 3 = Somewhat disagree; 4 = Neither agree nor disagree; 5 = Somewhat agree; 6 = Agree; 7 = Strongly agree (POSITIVELY SCORED ITEM)

ElementDescription: If someone's actions do not relate to me directly, I generally do not concern myself with why they do what they do.
Notes: 1 = Strongly agree; 2 = Agree; 3 = Somewhat agree; 4 = Neither agree nor disagree; 5 = Somewhat disagree; 6 = disgree; 7 = Strongly disagree (Reverse scored item)

ElementDescription: When I am conversing with more than one person, I like to think about how one person is interpreting what another person says in the conversation.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Disagree; 3 = Somewhat disagree; 4 = Neither agree nor disagree; 5 = Somewhat agree; 6 = Agree; 7 = Strongly agree (POSITIVELY SCORED ITEM)

ElementDescription: I don't tend to actively seek out other people's opinions, even when they probably agree with my own.
Notes: 1 = Strongly agree; 2 = Agree; 3 = Somewhat agree; 4 = Neither agree nor disagree; 5 = Somewhat disagree; 6 = disgree; 7 = Strongly disagree (Reverse scored item)

ElementDescription: I rarely find myself wondering what other people are thinking.
Notes: 1 = Strongly agree; 2 = Agree; 3 = Somewhat agree; 4 = Neither agree nor disagree; 5 = Somewhat disagree; 6 = disgree; 7 = Strongly disagree (Reverse scored item)

ElementDescription: There is just something intriguing about the insight different people can offer about someone else's motivations and perspective.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Disagree; 3 = Somewhat disagree; 4 = Neither agree nor disagree; 5 = Somewhat agree; 6 = Agree; 7 = Strongly agree (POSITIVELY SCORED ITEM)

ElementDescription: In a social group, I don't make any special effort to keep track of what each person thinks about the other people in the group.
Notes: 1 = Strongly agree; 2 = Agree; 3 = Somewhat agree; 4 = Neither agree nor disagree; 5 = Somewhat disagree; 6 = disgree; 7 = Strongly disagree (Reverse scored item)

ElementDescription: When I see two strangers arguing, I often catch myself speculating on what their conflict is.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Disagree; 3 = Somewhat disagree; 4 = Neither agree nor disagree; 5 = Somewhat agree; 6 = Agree; 7 = Strongly agree (POSITIVELY SCORED ITEM)

ElementDescription: People who disagree with me about important issues are generally just misinformed.
Notes: 1 = Strongly agree; 2 = Agree; 3 = Somewhat agree; 4 = Neither agree nor disagree; 5 = Somewhat disagree; 6 = disgree; 7 = Strongly disagree (Reverse scored item)

ElementDescription: It is pointless to try to see things from other people's points of view.
Notes: 1 = Strongly agree; 2 = Agree; 3 = Somewhat agree; 4 = Neither agree nor disagree; 5 = Somewhat disagree; 6 = disgree; 7 = Strongly disagree (Reverse scored item)

ElementDescription: I have little patience for listening to other people's problems.
Notes: 1 = Strongly agree; 2 = Agree; 3 = Somewhat agree; 4 = Neither agree nor disagree; 5 = Somewhat disagree; 6 = disgree; 7 = Strongly disagree (Reverse scored item)

ElementDescription: If I can tell where someone is coming from, I don't need other people's thoughts on the matter.
Notes: 1 = Strongly agree; 2 = Agree; 3 = Somewhat agree; 4 = Neither agree nor disagree; 5 = Somewhat disagree; 6 = disgree; 7 = Strongly disagree (Reverse scored item)

ElementDescription: If the way I define something works for me, I don't need to know what other people think about it.
Notes: 1 = Strongly agree; 2 = Agree; 3 = Somewhat agree; 4 = Neither agree nor disagree; 5 = Somewhat disagree; 6 = disgree; 7 = Strongly disagree (Reverse scored item)

ElementDescription: Total Mind-Reading Motivation Scale Score
